file_content.text: You fight admirably, for a Jedi. But not even the Voss can save your Republic.
You are dying. Release your hatred, feel the sanctity of this place.
Be at peace.
So naive. But I feel... calm.
A fair duel, but this is over.
Goodbye.
Your darkness is coming. I hope you're prepared.
Just die.
No! I won't be defeated, I....
My wound... freezes. Burns.
Moving will only spread the toxin faster.
Please, sit still.
I've never encountered this poison before.
I don't think I can heal you.
Unless you return to Voss-Ka and explain what happened, the Empire will have its victory.
You must report this.
The shrine. Take me to the Shrine of Healing.
Should be safe place, Herald, if more dark things are close.
The poor boy's obviously delirious.
Kid, please, you really need a medic, not a shrine.
Could patch up and regroup there.
You mustn't die! Jedi, can't you do something?
The shrine's healers. Please, be sure it is safe. Then call, we go.
[Gaden-Ko waits for when the path will be safe for him]
